page.text: ALS Association of Georgia, Patient Services Intern, Atlanta, GA
May 2011-May 2012
Revived “Helping Hands Program” that supports ALS patients & families with ongoing non- medical assistance
Organized and matched 10 volunteer pairs with 7 families throughout Georgia

Completed more than 500 hours of volunteer service

marketing and communication

professoriate
